identified-content.object.title: Rocky Horror Picture Show (Movie)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Media, Entertainment and Publishing

abstract.p: Fox Home Entertainment opens marketing campaign featuring more than 100 tie-in products to coincide with DVD release of Rocky Horror Picture Show; photo (Pulse column: Halloween Special) (S)

block.p: Was it really 25 years ago that we first met that ''Sweet Transvestite'' Dr. Frank N Furter? Talk about a Time Warp. To celebrate the silver (lame) anniversary of ''The Rocky Horror Picture Show,'' Fox Home Entertainment has released it on DVD. An accompanying ''Absolute Pleasure'' marketing campaign features more than 100 licensed tie-in products, including action figures of the mod doctor (right), Riff Raff and the tap-dancing groupie Columbia. To see them, you can click on www.rockyhorrorat25.com.

Was it really 25 years ago that we first met that ''Sweet Transvestite'' Dr. Frank N Furter? Talk about a Time Warp. To celebrate the silver (lame) anniversary of ''The Rocky Horror Picture Show,'' Fox Home Entertainment has released it on DVD. An accompanying ''Absolute Pleasure'' marketing campaign features more than 100 licensed tie-in products, including action figures of the mod doctor (right), Riff Raff and the tap-dancing groupie Columbia. To see them, you can click on www.rockyhorrorat25.com.

The festivities don't stop there. VH1 will devote its Halloween night programming to ''Rocky Horror'' related shows, like a celebrity karaoke special with Eric McCormack, the star of ''Will and Grace,'' wearing the merry widow and fishnets that Tim Curry made famous. The musical that started it all is back, too. A revival of ''The Rocky Horror Show,'' with Dick Cavett and Lea DeLaria, is in previews on Broadway. Prepare to throw toast.
